website_summaries.verdict: A wax-free solution for treating minor scratches.
pros: This effective solution gives a shine to paint dulled by swirls, and treats minor scratches well
Since this is a wax-free solution, it removes scratches rather than filling them with wax
Can be used by hand or with a polisher or buffer
cons: This solution can remove the clear coat if used too aggressively

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for surface damage.
customer_reviews.text: This has worked very well for me the two times I've used it. One from white garage paint scuffing my grey vehicle and the most recent from something orange that scraped my girlfriend's white sideview mirror. I wish I had taken a before and after photo, but the mirror was nearly completely orange and she was expecting to need to purchase a replacement. After using this, you would never know anything happened. Please know that this product is not intended for deep damage but has worked great for my issues which were mostly surface damage.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my car
customer_reviews.text: My car lease was up and I had some dents and scratches in the back of my car that I needed to fix. I am so happy I tried this. After a lot of elbow grease and reapplication, the scratches disappeared and I didn't get charged any wear and tear. So worth it. I just used a microfiber cloth I already had and didn't need to use the 3M detail cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this, I read through all the reviews. And after seeing good feedbacks, I decided to give it a try. I tried on few scratches. Unlucky, none worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jay D

customer_reviews.title: Trailer rash, be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I’m blown away with this stuff. I had some gnarly trailer rash on my 4Runner after a little fun in the forest. I almost bit the bullet and called an auto detailer to rectify the problem. Fortunately, I had a bottle of this stuff laying around and decided to give it a try. In combination with microfiber cloths, a detailer and a liquid wax, I was able to remove all traces of trailer rash (although it took me about 2 hours to complete). Hard to go wrong with a 3M product!
customer_reviews.author: Poster89

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: I have a gloss black car. I bought this hoping it would get a few minor scratches I have out but unfortunately it didn't work. However might just be scratches or too deep. However my two-star review is not based solely on the fact that this stuff was not able to remove any of the scratches, it was not able to remove any of the many swirl marks on my car either..
customer_reviews.author: JPB

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this applied to to some minor scratches on my car. To my surprise it didn’t work plus they gave me the product but no equipment to work with the product like a application pad. So I used one that I purchased to apply 3MD scratch remover. Put it on clockwise and anti clockwise to work out the scratch as instructed the next day no improve result.👎👎👎👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Kenroy Williams

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I had 4-5 minor scratches from a scrape on my car door. I also had 2 deeper scratches rather long, 3-4 inches. I followed the instructions and tried several times to remove or improve the scratch lines. It did not improve anything only it may have enhanced the visibility rather than remove or improve the appearance. I would not recommend this product. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: FrankP

customer_reviews.title: Did not remove rub marks or two minor scratches.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed.It didnt remove two rub marks on tailgate,nor twoo minor scratches in clear coat.Product is very mild.At least it didnt damage the paint any further.Save your money,try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: This item says it’s a scratch remover it is not.
customer_reviews.text: This item says it’s a scratch remover it is not. This item may be able to remove minor scuffs but no matter how much you use and how long you use it it will not remove or even lessen any scratches
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Works but needs hard work to get the results.
customer_reviews.text: It works great but be ready to spend at least half an hour rubbing this hard onto the surface that needs a repair or removal of old marks. Multiple applications of this product on my bumper cover and hard rubbing followed by buffing done a great job. Don't give up on the first couple of applications; just keep applying and hard rubbing and buffing. At the very end, finish up with a nice waxed polish. Please see before and after picture.
customer_reviews.author: Duke NJ

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: While waiting for my car at the car wash, I realized someone had side swiped the front of my 2018 white Honda Civic. I couldn't believe it. I decided to purchase this product and just used it. OH MY GOSH! It eliminated all of the scratches and even old ones that have been there since I bought the car. This stuff is incredible!!! Obviously deep scratches and paint peeled remains but everything else, GONE! This was so worth it! I am recommending it to my family and will use it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Kasbeau

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: I used this with phenomenal success on 3 different cars. My friends Olds Alero looked brand new when finished and he could not believe it.. Only detraction is that it can take a lot of elbow grease on some scratches, but in the end it is worth all the effort.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Rudisill

customer_reviews.title: No use at all.
customer_reviews.text: It is no use at all. Are those five star review fake? Our car has a slight scratch and I applied t as indicated but the scratch has not been improved at all. I will add some video later.
customer_reviews.author: Jun Wang

customer_reviews.title: Took care of paint transfer on my car bumper.
customer_reviews.text: Removed paint transfer from my rear bumper with very little problem; worked perfectly well for what I bought it for. Used it with a microfiber cloth and a bit of elbow grease, and it came out with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money buying this product. It does nothing of what it promises, doesn't eliminate a minimum scratch, its consistency is bad, in short there are many cheaper products that make a better job.

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way

customer_reviews.title: Works great for light scratching
customer_reviews.text: I used this after claying my car. It did remove some of the very light scratches, but you would really have to work at it to remove any scratches deeper than swirl marks. If you have deeper scratches, you might try using a coarser compound, or even some 3000-6000 grit sandpaper, then follow up with this 3M product to finish.

product_meta.title: 3M Scratch Remover, 39044, 8 fl oz,Black
product_meta.description:
Style:3M Scratch Remover, 8 oz| Product Packaging:retail packaging3M Scratch Remover offers an ideal way to repair simple damage such as course-to-fine scratches, swirl marks, or paint imperfections with no hassle and no waiting. Our product uses fine minerals to remove the scratches from the paint and bring back a high polish finish. Using our paint scratch remover is an inexpensive option for repairing automotive surface blemishes.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


?Scratches Disappear
3M Scratch Remover actually polishes out scratches from clear coats, not just fill them in with wax like many products do. What's left behind is a beautiful, high-polished finish that will impress you. This product removes many types of automotive surface blemishes, including car wash scratches, scuffs, oxidation, light stains, tree and shrub branch streaks and surface contaminants. 

A Choice of Application Methods
We formulated our scratch remover for cars for ease of use. It's a versatile product that may be applied by either and or machine. When applied by hand, it is easier to use than rubbing compound and doesn't require any tools. 

Directions for Use

To Apply By Hand

 1. Apply to small areas, about one to two square feet.
 2. Dispense a quarter size drop of remover onto a clean, soft, microfiber cloth. Apply to the painted surface using a firm circular motion.
 3. Work the area using a firm, circular motion until the cleaner is dry.
 4. Remove remaining film using a 3M Microfiber Detailing Cloth (PN 39016)

To Apply By Machine

 1. Dispense enough material on the surface to work a one-foot by one-foot area.
 2. Buff area using an air or electric buffer equipped with a 3M Polishing Pad using light to medium pressure.
 3. Reduce pressure when product begins to dry.
 4. Remove remaining film using a 3M Microfiber Detailing Cloth (PN 39016)

Professional Results the Easy Way
3M Scratch Remover adapts the trusted technology and innovation found in the professional scratch repair products into a simple solution. It offers ease of application and is very economical to use. This scratch removal product is an excellent choice for removing blemishes on cars, trucks, motorcycles and snowmobiles.
feature_bullets: Scratch remover eliminates scratches, swirl marks and more
Formula contains no wax so scratches are polished out, not filled in
Compound combines medium-cutting with fine finishing
Versatile product may be applied by hand or machine
Product delivers professional results at an economy rate
